title: Minister of Foreign Affairs received by high Sudanese authorities
text:
As part of his working visit to the Republic of Sudan, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr Ramtane Lamamra, was received on Saturday by President of the Sovereign Council, Army General Abdel Fattah Al-Burhan to whom he conveyed a message from President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
The meeting allowed the strengthening relations of solidarity between Algeria and Sudan and their brotherly peoples, and to highlight the will and determination of the two officials to give a new impetus to bilateral relations.
In this regard, President Al-Burhan asked Mr Lamamra to convey his best regards to his brother President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, while welcoming Algeria's efforts and its constant commitment to the peaceful resolution of crises and conflicts and its constructive role in the development of the region.
On the other hand, Mr Lamamra was received by the President of the Council of Ministers Mr Abdallah Hamdok.
Finally, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad held a session of extensive consultations with his Sudanese counterpart Mariam Sadek al-Mahdi. The two heads of diplomacy welcomed the quality of political relations between the two countries and renewed their commitment to work together to strengthen bilateral cooperation in strategic areas.
